479200.name: Champions of Odin
479200.description:
As war plagues The Nine Worlds, mighty Odin faces the biggest challenge of his life - tracking down the soul of his murdered wife. Champions of Odin is a first-person, action role-playing game set in a visually stunning Norse Mythology universe. In Champions of Odin, you play as the fearless god Odin, tasked with a gruesome quest into the Norse Underworld to revive the soul of your murdered lover.

Champions of Odin is being released episodically. Each episode will take place in 1 of the 9 realms of Norse Mythology. The first episode takes place in Jotunheim, the land of the giants.
479200.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
